overview:
Jon is the Life Science Practice Manager for Business Intelligence Solutions. In this role his responsibilites are business development and account management.

He works with industry consultants and software partners to provide regulatory compliance software solutions and professional services to medical device, pharmaceutical and healthcare companies.

His focus is to provide effective strategies that will help create greater profitability and market differentiation for his clients. Working with CEOs and senior executives, Jon employes new solutions and strategies to help companies streamline internal processes that drive efficiencies and increase productivity.
